sentences.sContent: The managing director wrote personally to thank me.
sentences.sCn: 总经理亲自写信向我表示感谢。

sentences.sContent: All important work is personally approved by him.
sentences.sCn: 所有重要的工作都由他亲自批准。

synos.tran: 亲自地；当面；个别地；就自己而言

phrases.pCn: 就个人来说，就自己而言

words.tran: 人事消息栏；人称代名词
个性化（personalize的过去式）；个人化

trans.tranCn: 亲自地；当面；个别地；就自己而言
trans.tranOther: if you do something personally, you do it yourself rather than getting someone else to do it
